text: Daniel "Dănuţ" Sabou (born 4 November 1979 in Baia Mare) is a former Romanian football player. He played as a central defensive midfielder and is currently the manager of Sporting Recea. ==External links== * Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:CS Minaur Baia Mare (football) players Category:FC Vaslui players Category:ACF Gloria Bistrița players Category:FC Unirea Alba Iulia players Category:Romanian footballers Category:Sportspeople from Baia Mare Category:Association football midfielders Category:FC Unirea Dej players
title: Daniel Sabou
